p.s: Boris Johnsonuse diffrentuses different stylistic devices and a specific structure on his argumentation to increase the audience's attention to the danger of climate change.

The comparison with the James Bond movies makes the audience clear that the can take action to prevent climate change, because every protagonist in movies got the time to action on certain events and this is what Johnson wants to show.
Three times in the speech he repeats sentences like We have the technology to deactivate that ticking doomsday device (ll. 16f).
This repeatmentrepetition gives hope that things can be changed in the future.

His argumentation starts with things that could have happened in the past on other conferences then he goes over how to prevent the problem and finally what happens when they do not do anything about it.
It is brilliant to talk at the end over the people who will suffer.
And let us think of the billions more of the unborn, whose anger will be all the greater if we fail(ll. 44f).
This is a sentence that catches everyone of the audience because it is on a personal level and reaches specific emotialemotional feeling when you have your own families.
